segments.text: I notice the boy struggling to keep his balance on that stool, and I hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement for the cookies is palpable, yet I feel this knot in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the cookies calling to him, loud and irresistible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing in a way, this little heist he’s conducting with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I think about the consequences—what if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to flow, a constant reminder of an impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a clash of innocence and danger, and it plays out right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR
